document_data.name: ''Telvaran's Enchanted Blade''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Telvaran's Enchanted Blade''''' was a famous lost [[enchanted|magical]] [[sword]] as of the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|25}}
document_data.Powers: It possessed all the same powers as a ''[[rod of lordly might]]'', and others that were not recorded.
document_data.History: In [[Tsurlagol]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 1350s DR, an unnamed female [[human]] [[adventurer]] presented a magical sword to the sage [[Othiiyr Velthrann]] for identification. He found it to ''Telvaran's Enchanted Blade''. But the client [[teleport]]ed away without even paying, so Othiiyr revealed the finding to others—when a client didn't pay, it was permitted to break the traditional bond of secrecy meant to exist between sages and clients. Its location and ownership remained unknown.
